tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_resources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity DECIMAL(10, 2),
    efficiency DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_production (
  production_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  panel_id INT,
  turbine_id INT,
  energy_produced FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (turbine_id) REFERENCES wind_turbines(turbine_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  panel_id INT,
  turbine_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (panel_id) REFERENCES solar_panels(panel_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (turbine_id) REFERENCES wind_turbines(turbine_id)
);
